## Validate.toQualifierContextValue() function

Converts a string to a [QualifierContextValue](./ts-res.qualifiercontextvalue.md) if it is a valid qualifier context value.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function toQualifierContextValue(value: string): Result<QualifierContextValue>;
```

**Returns:**

Result&lt;[QualifierContextValue](./ts-res.qualifiercontextvalue.md)<!-- -->&gt;

`Success` with the converted [QualifierContextValue](./ts-res.qualifiercontextvalue.md) if successful, or `Failure` with an error message if not.
